name: Super Chonk Ball
description:
SUPER CHONK BALL is a 1v1 arcade-style local multiplayer only game. Take control of either Wiggles or Wobbler and triple-jump and dash through the court and try to kick a gravity-defying beach ball into your opponent's net. Sounds too easy? Well, you must control your goalie's movement at the same time!

Two players can play with the same keyboard or you can connect up to two gamepads.

I hope you enjoy!
